metadata.name: MESOPOTAMIA
metadata.description: Welcome to the "Mesopotamia". Our team found these objects in various ground layers, which speaks of the great antiquity of the culture that inhabited this place. Being between two large rivers, the inhabitants of this area have lived and created culture for thousands of years. These finds are the oldest among similar objects of a highly developed culture. Engineering solutions, writing, mathematics were all invented here. This means that you watching at the cradle of civilization on this planet.
